name: Jingle Bells Christmas Tree Decoration
description:
I love Christmas... the family get togethers, the food, the presents, the decorations and the holidays.

Oh welcome, dear Christmas Tree...

This lovely folk style Christmas tree has been hand-drawn, cut from dark green felt and hand-sewn together. Decorated with three white jingle bells for that extra festive look. 

With a red gingham ribbon loop, it can be used to decorate your tree, window, mantlepiece, door or bannister. 

Lightly filled with polyester stuffing and with an 'ilovehearts' label on the reverse side.

Approximate size excluding ribbon: W11.0 x H15.0 x D4.0cm / W4.3 x H6.0 x D1.7"

♡ An original design by ilovehearts, designed and handmade in the UK.

Notes:
1. This item is not a toy and is for decoration only. Unsuitable for children under 3 years of age.
2. Each item has been individually handmade and may vary slightly to that shown in the photos.

style no. E557

name: Felt Gingerbread House Decoration
description:
Ooh, it must be that special time of year...

Lots of making, baking, roasting, singing and being MERRY!

This wonderful Gingerbread House Decoration has been drawn the old-fashioned way using paper and pencil. Then cut out from felt by hand and sewn together with much love and happiness.

Finished with a red gingham ribbon and lightly filled with polyester stuffing. 

Approximate size excluding ribbon: W11.5 x H12.5mm x D3.0cm / W4.5 x H5.0 x D1.2"

♡ An original design by ilovehearts, designed and handmade in the UK.

Notes:  
1. This item is for decoration only and is unsuitable for children under 3 years of age.
2. Each item has been individually handmade and may differ slightly to that shown in the photos.

name: Felt Tree Magnets
description:
This is an adorable set of felt tree magnets. Such a cute little tree family!

Each tree is hand-sewn from felt and decorated with a lovely button.

Left Tree: Pirate green with flower-shaped wooden button
Approximate size (width x height x depth): 4.5 x 8.5 x 2.0cm / 1.75 x 3.25 x 0.75"

Centre Tree: Kelly green with red heart-shaped button
Approximate size (width x height x depth): 4.5 x 10.0 x 2.0cm / 1.75 x 4.0 x 0.75"

Right Tree: Apple green with square wooden button
Approximate size (width x height x depth): 4.0 x 6.5 x 1.5cm / 1.5 x 2.5 x 0.5"

With a round magnet glued securely and concealed inside for extra safety. Delicately filled with polyester filling.

♡ An original design by ilovehearts, designed and handmade in the UK.

Notes:
1. This item is for decoration only and is unsuitable for children under 3 years of age
2. Each item is handmade and may vary slightly to that shown in the photos
3. Signature required on delivery

name: Felt Christmas Pudding Decoration
description:
I love a little Christmas pudding.
With a little custard, please...

Soft and rich, sweet and fruity.
Who can resist this ever so cute handmade feltie?

Hand-sewn using layers of felt, colourful ribbons and topped with the most luxurious red velvet bell.

It will look fabulous on your tree or can be used to decorate a festive room or a special gift.

Approximate size excluding ribbon (width x height x depth): 80 x 100 x 40mm / 3.1 x 4.0 x 1.5"

2. Each item is handmade and may vary slightly to that shown in the photo.
3. Christmas pudding decoration only will be supplied. Other decorations shown are not included.

name: Folk Style Christmas Tree Decoration
description:
I especially love the Christmas festivities... the family get togethers, the food, the presents, the decorations and the holidays.

Oh welcome, dear Christmas Tree...

This lovely green folk style Christmas tree is completely hand-stitched and is decorated with three red felt hearts. Do you love its shapely curves too?

Super cute set of two red and white felt stockings.

One is decorated with a wooden heart button and a white star button. The other is decorated with a wooden flower button and a white heart button.

Each is finished with a red ribbon to spread a little cheer. Hand-stitched and lightly filled with polyester filling.

This cute robin decoration has been hand-sewn using layers of felt to create his red breast and a little wing which can be shaped and positioned to give a more 3D effect.

name: Kawaii Felt Tooth Fairy Pocket
description:
Happy smiles for the Tooth Fairy...

She will be able to find your tooth easily with this felt tooth pocket. Hang it by your bedside or on your bedroom door.

This cute felt tooth has a big smile and rosy cheeks too. On the reverse side is a pocket for you to keep your tooth safe until the Tooth Fairy comes along and swaps it for a coin.

Hand-drawn and cut out of white felt. Stitched with lots of love and filled with polyester stuffing. Little black buttons for eyes, pink felt cheeks and an embroidered smile. 

Available in a choice of two ribbon colours:
♡ Pink Gingham
♡ Blue Gingham

Each one will be different… so you could keep them all for yourself and wear something different every day.

They make gorgeous little gifts for goodie bags, party favours or Christmas stocking fillers.

Each hair clip is attached to a cardboard tag. I love sweet surprises…

I like the cute little vintage ones found in pastel colours and decorated with bunting and pretty fabrics.

I think I know which type would suit this sweet little caravan keyring.

Hand-drawn, hand-cut and hand-sewn using felt, red polka dot ribbon and a mother of pearl button for its wheel. 

Looped onto a keyring to keep your caravan keys safe. With a clasp too so that you can also use it as a bag charm. 

Includes an 'ilovehearts' label on the reverse side and lightly filled with polyester stuffing.
